PAL.NAME: VMWare View Connection Server Performance
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Display VMWare View Connection Server VM Processor and VM Memory counters, plus VDM stats

ANALYSIS.NAME: All Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Total numberof all View sessions active over the sampling period..

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\All Sessions
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Audio Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Audio Bytes Received

ANALYSIS.NAME: All Sessions High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Running count of the max number of sessions this View Connection Server has served at any one time.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\All Sessions High
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Audio Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Audio Bytes Sent

ANALYSIS.NAME: Check Out VMs
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of View Local Mode Desktops currently checked out for offline use over the sampling period.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\Check Out VMs
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Audio Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Audio RX BW kbit/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: Check Out VMs High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Number of View Local Mode Desktops checked out for offline use at any one time.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\Check Out VMs High
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Audio Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Audio TX BW kbit/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: Full VM Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Total number of Full VM sessions in use over the sampling period.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\Full VM Sessions
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Audio Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Audio TX BW Limit kbit/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: Full VM Sessions High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of Full VM sessions at any one time.

ANALYSIS.NAME: Linked Clone Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Total number of Linked Clone sessions in use over the sampling period.

ANALYSIS.NAME: Linked Clone Sessions High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of Linked Clone sessions at any one time.

ANALYSIS.NAME: Other Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Total number of other sessions in use over the sampling period, including admin, TS, etc..

ANALYSIS.NAME: Other Sessions High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of other sessions in use any any one time, including admin, TS, etc..

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\Other Sessions High
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session General Statistics(PCoIP Session)\RX Packets Lost

ANALYSIS.NAME: PCoIP Gateway Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Total number of PCoIP gateway sessions that are currently open.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\PCoIP Gateway Sessions
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session General Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Session Duration Seconds

ANALYSIS.NAME: PCoIP Gateway Sessions High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: An incrementing number that represents the total number of PCoIP gateway sessions that have been open at any one time

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\PCoIP Gateway Sessions High
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session General Statistics(PCoIP Session)\TX Packets Lost

ANALYSIS.NAME: Secure Gateway Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Total number of Secure Gateway sessions that are currently open.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\Secure Gateway Sessions
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Imaging Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Imaging Active Minimum Quality

ANALYSIS.NAME: Secure Gateway Sessions High
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: An incrementing number that represents the total number of Secure Gateway sessions that have been open at any one time

DATASOURCE.NAME: \VMware VDM\Secure Gateway Sessions High
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \PCoIP Session Imaging Statistics(PCoIP Session)\Imaging Bytes Received
